languages.text: "Тогда Вольный Торговец высадил{mf|ся|ась} на борт судна в попытке осуществить захват десятины. {mf|Его|Ее} действия привели к гибели отряда арбитров — лишь проктор Антар пережил покушение. {name} фон Валанциус лично устранил{mf||а} подельника, капитана Саргону, с целью уничтожения улик". {n}Префект отрывается от свитка и бросает на вас равнодушный взгляд.{/n} "Имеете что-то сказать в оправдание?"

"Then the Rogue Trader boarded the ship in an attempt to seize the tithe. {mf|His|Her} actions led to the death of a squad of Arbitrators — Proctor Anthar alone survived the Rogue Trader's murderous ploy. {name} von Valancius personally eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice, Captain Sargona, in order to destroy the evidence of {mf|his|her} schemes." {n}The prefect looks up from the scroll and sweeps her indifferent gaze over you.{/n} "Do you have anything to say in your defence?"
languages.original_text: "Тогда Вольный Торговец высадил{mf|ся|ась} на борт судна в попытке осуществить захват десятины. {mf|Его|Ее} действия привели к гибели отряда арбитров — лишь проктор Антар пережил покушение. {name} фон Валанциус лично устранил{mf||а} подельника, капитана Саргону, с целью уничтожения улик". {n}Префект отрывается от свитка и бросает на вас равнодушный взгляд.{/n} "Имеете что-то сказать в оправдание?"

traits.locale_text: "Then the Rogue Trader boarded the ship in an attempt to seize the tithe. {mf|His|Her} actions led to the death of a squad of Arbitrators — Proctor Anthar alone survived the Rogue Trader's murderous ploy. {name} von Valancius personally eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice, Captain Sargona, in order to destroy the evidence of {mf|his|her} schemes." {n}The prefect looks up from the scroll and sweeps her indifferent gaze over you.{/n} "Do you have anything to say in your defence?"

"Then the Rogue Trader boarded the ship in an attempt to seize the tithe. {mf|His|Her} actions led to the death of a squad of Arbitrators — Proctor Anthar alone survived the Rogue Trader's murderous ploy. {name} von Valancius personally eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice, Captain Sargona, in order to destroy the evidence of {mf|his|her} schemes." {n}The prefect looks up from the scroll and sweeps her indifferent gaze over you.{/n} "Do you have anything to say in your defence?"

"Then the Rogue Trader boarded the ship in an attempt to seize the tithe. {mf|His|Her} actions led to the death of a squad of Arbitrators — Proctor Anthar alone survived the Rogue Trader's murderous ploy. {name} von Valancius personally eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice, Captain Sargona, in order to destroy the evidence of {mf|his|her} schemes." {n}The prefect looks up from the scroll and sweeps her indifferent gaze over you.{/n} "Do you have anything to say in your defence?"

"Then the Rogue Trader boarded the ship in an attempt to seize the tithe. {mf|His|Her} actions led to the death of a squad of Arbitrators — Proctor Anthar alone survived the Rogue Trader's murderous ploy. {name} von Valancius personally eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice, Captain Sargona, in order to destroy the evidence of {mf|his|her} schemes." {n}The prefect looks up from the scroll and sweeps her indifferent gaze over you.{/n} "Do you have anything to say in your defence?"

"Then the Rogue Trader boarded the ship in an attempt to seize the tithe. {mf|His|Her} actions led to the death of a squad of Arbitrators — Proctor Anthar alone survived the Rogue Trader's murderous ploy. {name} von Valancius personally eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice, Captain Sargona, in order to destroy the evidence of {mf|his|her} schemes." {n}The prefect looks up from the scroll and sweeps her indifferent gaze over you.{/n} "Do you have anything to say in your defence?"

languages.text: "Dann ging {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} an Bord des Schiffs und versuche, den Zehnt an sich zu bringen. Dies führte zum Tod eines Trupps von Arbitratoren – lediglich Proktor Anthar überlebte die mörderische List {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. {name} von Valancius hat {mf|seinen|ihren} Komplizen, Kapitän Sargona, eigenhändig getötet, um alle Beweise für {mf|seine|ihre} Intrigen zu vernichten." {n}Die Präfektin sieht von der Schriftrolle auf und wirft dir einen gleichgültigen Blick zu.{/n} "Habt Ihr etwas zu Eurer Verteidigung zu sagen?"
languages.original_text: "Then the Rogue Trader boarded the ship in an attempt to seize the tithe. {mf|His|Her} actions led to the death of a squad of Arbitrators — Proctor Anthar alone survived the Rogue Trader's murderous ploy. {name} von Valancius personally eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice, Captain Sargona, in order to destroy the evidence of {mf|his|her} schemes." {n}The prefect looks up from the scroll and sweeps her indifferent gaze over you.{/n} "Do you have anything to say in your defence?"

traits.locale_text: "Dann ging {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} an Bord des Schiffs und versuche, den Zehnt an sich zu bringen. Dies führte zum Tod eines Trupps von Arbitratoren – lediglich Proktor Anthar überlebte die mörderische List {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. {name} von Valancius hat {mf|seinen|ihren} Komplizen, Kapitän Sargona, eigenhändig getötet, um alle Beweise für {mf|seine|ihre} Intrigen zu vernichten." {n}Die Präfektin sieht von der Schriftrolle auf und wirft dir einen gleichgültigen Blick zu.{/n} "Habt Ihr etwas zu Eurer Verteidigung zu sagen?"

languages.text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand est ensuite monté|La libre-marchande est ensuite montée} à bord du vaisseau pour tenter de s'emparer de la dîme. Ses agissements ont conduit à la mort d'une escouade d'arbitrators. Seul le proctor Anthar a survécu son complot meurtrier. {name} von Valancius s'est par la suite personnellement {mf|débarrassé|débarrassée} de son complice, le capitaine Sargona, dans le but de faire disparaître les preuves de ses crimes. {n}La préfète lève les yeux du parchemin et pose sur vous un regard indifférent.{/n} Qu'avez-vous à dire pour votre défense ? »
languages.original_text: "Then the Rogue Trader boarded the ship in an attempt to seize the tithe. {mf|His|Her} actions led to the death of a squad of Arbitrators — Proctor Anthar alone survived the Rogue Trader's murderous ploy. {name} von Valancius personally eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice, Captain Sargona, in order to destroy the evidence of {mf|his|her} schemes." {n}The prefect looks up from the scroll and sweeps her indifferent gaze over you.{/n} "Do you have anything to say in your defence?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand est ensuite monté|La libre-marchande est ensuite montée} à bord du vaisseau pour tenter de s'emparer de la dîme. Ses agissements ont conduit à la mort d'une escouade d'arbitrators. Seul le proctor Anthar a survécu son complot meurtrier. {name} von Valancius s'est par la suite personnellement {mf|débarrassé|débarrassée} de son complice, le capitaine Sargona, dans le but de faire disparaître les preuves de ses crimes. {n}La préfète lève les yeux du parchemin et pose sur vous un regard indifférent.{/n} Qu'avez-vous à dire pour votre défense ? »

languages.text: “在此之后，行商浪人登上了那艘船，试图夺取神圣什一税。{mf|他|她}的所作所为导致整支法务官小队不幸战死，只有安萨监察官独自一人从行商浪人的邪恶阴谋中存活下来。随后，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯为了销毁罪证，亲自除掉了{mf|他|她}的同伙萨戈纳舰长。”{n}行政官从卷宗中抬起头来，以冷漠的目光扫视着你。{/n}“你有什么要为自己辩护的吗？”
languages.original_text: "Then the Rogue Trader boarded the ship in an attempt to seize the tithe. {mf|His|Her} actions led to the death of a squad of Arbitrators — Proctor Anthar alone survived the Rogue Trader's murderous ploy. {name} von Valancius personally eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice, Captain Sargona, in order to destroy the evidence of {mf|his|her} schemes." {n}The prefect looks up from the scroll and sweeps her indifferent gaze over you.{/n} "Do you have anything to say in your defence?"

traits.locale_text: “在此之后，行商浪人登上了那艘船，试图夺取神圣什一税。{mf|他|她}的所作所为导致整支法务官小队不幸战死，只有安萨监察官独自一人从行商浪人的邪恶阴谋中存活下来。随后，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯为了销毁罪证，亲自除掉了{mf|他|她}的同伙萨戈纳舰长。”{n}行政官从卷宗中抬起头来，以冷漠的目光扫视着你。{/n}“你有什么要为自己辩护的吗？”

languages.text: «Después, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente abordó la nave en un intento por hacerse con el diezmo. Sus actos condujeron a la muerte de un escuadrón de Arbitrator; el Procurador Anthar fue el único superviviente de su ardid letal. {name} von Valancius eliminó personalmente a su cómplice, el capitán Sargona, para destruir toda prueba de su conspiración». {n}La prefecta levanta la mirada del pergamino y posa su mirada indiferente sobre ti.{/n} «¿Tiene algo que decir en su defensa?».
languages.original_text: "Then the Rogue Trader boarded the ship in an attempt to seize the tithe. {mf|His|Her} actions led to the death of a squad of Arbitrators — Proctor Anthar alone survived the Rogue Trader's murderous ploy. {name} von Valancius personally eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice, Captain Sargona, in order to destroy the evidence of {mf|his|her} schemes." {n}The prefect looks up from the scroll and sweeps her indifferent gaze over you.{/n} "Do you have anything to say in your defence?"

traits.locale_text: «Después, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente abordó la nave en un intento por hacerse con el diezmo. Sus actos condujeron a la muerte de un escuadrón de Arbitrator; el Procurador Anthar fue el único superviviente de su ardid letal. {name} von Valancius eliminó personalmente a su cómplice, el capitán Sargona, para destruir toda prueba de su conspiración». {n}La prefecta levanta la mirada del pergamino y posa su mirada indiferente sobre ti.{/n} «¿Tiene algo que decir en su defensa?».

languages.text: 「その後、ローグトレーダーは租税を奪おうとして船に乗り込んだ。その行動によってアービトレイター部隊の一隊が命を落とし、アンサール代理人だけがローグトレーダーの殺意に満ちた策略から生き残った。{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、自らの企みの証拠を隠滅するため、共犯者であるキャプテン・サルゴナを自らの手で抹殺した」{n}総監は巻物から顔を上げ、無感情な視線であなたを一瞥した。{/n}「弁明はありますか？」
languages.original_text: "Then the Rogue Trader boarded the ship in an attempt to seize the tithe. {mf|His|Her} actions led to the death of a squad of Arbitrators — Proctor Anthar alone survived the Rogue Trader's murderous ploy. {name} von Valancius personally eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice, Captain Sargona, in order to destroy the evidence of {mf|his|her} schemes." {n}The prefect looks up from the scroll and sweeps her indifferent gaze over you.{/n} "Do you have anything to say in your defence?"

traits.locale_text: 「その後、ローグトレーダーは租税を奪おうとして船に乗り込んだ。その行動によってアービトレイター部隊の一隊が命を落とし、アンサール代理人だけがローグトレーダーの殺意に満ちた策略から生き残った。{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、自らの企みの証拠を隠滅するため、共犯者であるキャプテン・サルゴナを自らの手で抹殺した」{n}総監は巻物から顔を上げ、無感情な視線であなたを一瞥した。{/n}「弁明はありますか？」

languages.text: "Ardından Hür Tacir, aşara el koyma maksadıyla gemiyi bordalamış, bu esnada bir Yargıcı mangasının ölümüne yol açmıştır. Hür Tacir'in bu alçak girişiminden yalnızca Üsteğmen Anthar sağ çıkmayı başarmıştır. {name} von Valancius, suç ortağı Kaptan Sargona'yı bizzat infaz etmiş ve işlediği suçların delilini yok etmek istemiştir." {n}Prefekt, tomardan başını kaldırıp umursamaz bir tavırla seni süzüyor.{/n} "Bu suçlamalar karşısında diyecek bir şeyin var mı?"
languages.original_text: "Then the Rogue Trader boarded the ship in an attempt to seize the tithe. {mf|His|Her} actions led to the death of a squad of Arbitrators — Proctor Anthar alone survived the Rogue Trader's murderous ploy. {name} von Valancius personally eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice, Captain Sargona, in order to destroy the evidence of {mf|his|her} schemes." {n}The prefect looks up from the scroll and sweeps her indifferent gaze over you.{/n} "Do you have anything to say in your defence?"

traits.locale_text: "Ardından Hür Tacir, aşara el koyma maksadıyla gemiyi bordalamış, bu esnada bir Yargıcı mangasının ölümüne yol açmıştır. Hür Tacir'in bu alçak girişiminden yalnızca Üsteğmen Anthar sağ çıkmayı başarmıştır. {name} von Valancius, suç ortağı Kaptan Sargona'yı bizzat infaz etmiş, işlediği suçların delilini yok etmek istemiştir." {n}Prefekt, tomardan başını kaldırıp seni umursamaz bir tavırla süzüyor.{/n} "Bu suçlamalar karşısında diyecek bir şeyin var mı?"
